title: Competition Commission appoints Head of Enforcement and Exemptions (South Africa Competition Commission)
text: ( Source : South Africa Competition Commission ) d9482ea63e032c7ca00f67 .pdf Media Release 20 October 2015 Competition Commission appoints Head of Enforcement and Exemptions The Commission has appointed Ms Nompucuko Nontombana as the Divisional
